concept.title: T.I.P.S.
concept.shortdesc: T.I.P.S. is the minimum requirements for Token Layer as defined in the TokenScript Design Paper

dlentry.dd: User can trust a token to be used on a 3rd party website.
A token can be used on a 3rd party websites and with other tokens too.
A website that uses a token can only learn what they were supposed to.
User should be able to transact securely, knowing what they will spend and get from the transaction.

conbody.p: On top of TIPS, there are 2 lesser requirements that didn't make it into the acronym:

dlentry.dd: Tokens should work as long as the underlying blockchain smart contracts are working, not depending on the availability of specific websites.
Allow the use of attestation over transactions.
